mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO visa_user_info( email, first_name, middle_name, last_name, first_name_kana, middle_name_kana, last_name_kana, first_name_kanzi, last_name_kanzi, visatype_id, visa_date,country_id) VALUES ( #{email},#{first_name},#{middle_name},#{last_name},#{first_name_kana},#{middle_name_kana},#{last_name_kana}, #{first_name_kanzi},#{last_name_kanzi},#{visatype_id},#{visa_date},#{country_id});
INSERT INTO visa_login(email,password,role_id)VALUES(#{email},#{password},'R01');
